scripts.generate: npm run pre-build && nuxt generate --fail-on-error && npm run styleguide:build
scripts.pre-build: npm run generate:version && npm run build:packages && npm run build:detail && npm run build:tracker
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:package:BRecommendNewsBlock && npm run build:package:BRecommendAdBlock
scripts.build:package:BRecommendNewsBlock: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest static/packages/b-recommend-news-block --name BRecommendNewsBlock --filename index --inline-vue --formats umd-min components/packages/BRecommendNewsBlock.vue
scripts.build:package:BRecommendAdBlock: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest static/packages/b-recommend-ad-block --name BRecommendAdBlock --filename index --inline-vue --formats umd-min components/packages/BRecommendAdBlock.vue
scripts.generate:supplier: npm run pre-build:supplier && nuxt generate --fail-on-error --config-file nuxt.config.dev.js && npm run styleguide:build
scripts.pre-build:supplier: npm run generate:version &&npm run build:packages && npm run build:detail:supplier && npm run build:tracker
